hizbs.text: Wo yi zhege difang mengshi
ni jiang zai nali, bu shou ji shu
wo yi yige fuqin he tasuo sheng de zisun mengshi,
wo que yi ba ren chuangzao zai kunan li.
Ta yiwei renhe ren dou buneng zhicai ta ma?
Ta shuo: Wo huafeile xuduo caichan!
Ta yiwei renhe ren dou meiyou kanjian ta ma?
Nandao wo meiyou wei ta chuangzao liang zhi yanjing,
yitiao shetou, liang pian zuichun,
bing zhishi ta liang tiao mingxian de daolu ma?
Ta zenmo bu chaoyue shan jing ne?
Ni zen neng zhidao chaoyue shan jing shi shenmo shi?
Shi shifang nuli,
huo zai jihuang ri zhenji
qinqi de gu'er,
huo kun qiong de pinmin;
tongshi, ta shi yige xindao erqie xingshan, bing yi jianren xiang mian, yi ci min xiangzhu zhe.
Zhe deng ren shi xingfu de.
Buxin wo de jixiang zhe, shi boming de,
tamen jiang bei guan zai huo yu li.
Yi taiyang ji qi guanghui fashi,
yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
yi jieshi taiyang shi de baizhou fashi,
yi longzhao taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
yi cangqiong ji qi jianzhu zhe fashi,
yi dadi ji qi puzhan zhe fashi,
yi linghun jishi ta junheng,
bing qishi ta shan e zhe fashi,
fan peiyang ziji di xingling zhe, biding chenggong;
fan qianghai ziji di xingling zhe, biding shibai.
Sai mo de ren yi yin guofen er fouren zhenli.
Dangshi, tamen zhong zui boming zhe mang shang qian lai,
shizhe jiu dui tamen shuo: Nimen rang zhenzhu de mu tuo ziyou yinshui ba.
Dan tamen fouren shizhe er zaisha mu tuo, gu tamen de zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er huimie tamen, shi tamen pubian shounan.
Ta shi bu gulu na zainan de houguo de.
Yi longzhao shi de heiye fashi,
yi xianzhu shi de baizhou fashi,
yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu fashi,
nimen de xingwei, que shi butong de.
Zhiyu zhenji pinmin, jingwei zhenzhu,
qie chengren zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui yi de jieju.
Zhiyu linxi qiancai, zi wei wu qiu,
qie fouren zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui nan de jieju.
Dang ta lunwang de shihou, ta de caichan yu ta you she mo biyi ne!
Wo que you zhidao de zeren,
wo que you houshi he jinshi de zhuquan.
Guwo jinggao nimen yi zhong fa yan de huo,
wei boming zhe zhui ru qizhong,
ta fouren zhenli, er beiqi zhi.
Jingwei zhe, de mian yu huoxing.
Ta qiancheng de shishe ta de caichan,
ta meiyou shouguo renhe ren de ying bao de ende,
dan ta shishe zhishi weile qiu ta de zhizun zhu de xiyue,
ta ziji jianglai biding xiyue.
Shi yi shangwu,
shi yi heiye, dang qi jijing de shihou,
ni de zhu meiyou qi jue ni, ye meiyou yuanhen ni;
houshi yu ni, que bi jinshi geng hao;
ni de zhu jiang lai bi shangci ni, yizhi ni xiyue.
Nandao ta meiyou faxian ni lingding guku, er shi ni you suo guisu?
Ta ceng faxian ni paihuai qitu, er ba ni yinru zhenglu;
faxian ni jiajing hanku, er shi ni yishi fengzu.
Zhiyu gu'er, ni buyao yapo ta;
zhiyu qigai, ni buyao he chi ta,
zhiyu ni de zhu suo ci ni de endian ne, ni yingdang xuanshi ta.
